title: Ticket #3972: Support Ubuntu 12.04 (Precise Pangolin) as a platform
description: End users would like to install HTCondor directly from .deb files onto Ubuntu 12.04 (Precise Pangolin). Previously, they were installing the debian packages or the BaTlab package that were inadvertently placed on the download site. Recently, the since the advent of the python binding, the debian packages did not install cleanly on Ubuntu. Since there is demand, we should support this platform.
remarks:
2013-Oct-10 11:28:23 by tim:
This will be a clipped build for 64-bit (x86_64) only.

2013-Oct-15 09:51:30 by johnkn:
REVIEW: looks good to me. -tj
